ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hard to say.  The mob that dropped bard equipment in the PoF had (still has?) a bugged area effect spell that often crashed the zone.  I suspect most of
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Ok, so what obviously superior and befitting of a hybrid weapon do Bard's
> get from the plane of fear that makes those pale in comparison? Hmmm,
> that's what I thought.

Hard to say. The mob that dropped bard equipment in the PoF
had (still has?) a bugged area effect spell that often crashed
the zone. I suspect most of the bard items haven't even been
found yet, especially now that zone crash = insta-death upon
login in PoF.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
